title: SUPERHOT [v.2.3.07, update 3] (2016) PC | RePack by R G Freedom
description:
Year: 2016
Genre: Action (Shooter) / 3D / 1st Person
Developer: SUPERHOT Team
Publisher: SUPERHOT Team
Interface language: English
Voice language: English
Game version: 2.3.07 (update 3)
Publication type: RePack
Tablet: Not required (GOG)


System requirements:


OS: Windows 7/8/10
Processor: Intel Core2Quad Q6600 2,40 GHz
Memory: 4 GB
Graphics: GeForce GTX 650 | 1 GB RAM
Hard Drive: 4.2 GB available space


Description:


SUPERHOT - shooter with a first-person where time flows only when moving the main character. This approach to the gameplay is the key feature, which is built and the entire gameplay - precise aiming at enemies, dodge bullets, think over each step, and then enjoy the result.


Features repack:
1. It is based on license from GOG
2. Do not cut
3. No recoded
4. Tested on Win 7 x64;
5. RePack by R.G. Freedom
